list.name: tree closed
list.query: SELECT status_value,reason,who,status,repo FROM "autogen"."treestatus_stack_exec" WHERE "repo" =~ /mozilla-[cri]|^try$/ AND "status" = 'closed' AND $timeFilter

list.name: tree open
list.query: SELECT status_value,reason,who,status,repo FROM "autogen"."treestatus_stack_exec" WHERE "repo" =~ /mozilla-[cri]|^try$/ AND "status" = 'open' AND $timeFilter

targets.query: SELECT LAST("pendingTasks") AS "queue", LAST("running") AS "running", LAST("idle") AS "idle", LAST("workers") AS "workers", (LAST("pendingTasks") / LAST("workers")) * (MEAN("idle") / LAST("workers")) AS "lazy", LAST("quarantined") AS "quarantined", LAST("quarantined") / LAST("workers") AS "percent quarantined", mean("exception") AS "exception", mean("failed") AS "failed", mean("completed") AS "success", 1.0 - mean("completed") / (mean("exception") + mean("failed") + mean("completed")) as "percent failed" FROM "tc_queue2_exec" WHERE "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/ AND "provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY *

SELECT last("exception") AS "exception", last("failed") AS "failed", last("completed") AS "success" FROM "tc_queue2_exec" WHERE ("workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/ AND "provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "workerType", "provisionerId"

SELECT mean("running") AS "active", (mean("workers") - mean("quarantined")) AS "running", mean("quarantined") AS "quarantined" FROM "autogen"."tc_queue2_exec" WHERE ("provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/ AND "provisionerId" = 'releng-hardware') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval * 10), "workerType" fill(previous)

SELECT mean("pendingTasks") AS "queue" FROM "tc_queue_exec" WHERE ("provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "workerType" fill(none)

SELECT mean("running") AS "active2", mean("pendingTasks") AS "queue" FROM "autogen"."tc_queue2_exec" WHERE ("provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "workerType" fill(null)

SELECT mean("running") AS "active2", mean("pendingTasks") AS "queue" FROM "autogen"."tc_queue2_exec" WHERE ("provisionerId" =~ /^$provisioner$/ AND "workerType" =~ /^$workerType$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "workerType" fill(null)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM tc_queue_exec WITH KEY = "provisionerId"
list.name: provisioner
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM tc_queue_exec WITH KEY = "provisionerId"

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM tc_queue_exec WITH KEY = "workerType" WHERE provisionerId =~ /$provisioner/
list.name: workerType
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM tc_queue_exec WITH KEY = "workerType" WHERE provisionerId =~ /$provisioner/
list.tagsQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM tc_queue_exec WITH KEY = "provisionerId"
